Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE USE DISORDERS

Title: Provides that the results of urine tests conducted pursuant to a judicial diversion program shall be private and confidential
Summary: Provides that the results of urine tests conducted pursuant to a judicial diversion program shall be private and confidential.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to the privacy and confidentiality of urine test results performed pursuant to a judicial diversion program
